para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: There are two ways to operate the fixture manually:

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

text.style: font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

text.style: font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:10px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: The standard fixture interface comes with the Fixture Maintenance screen as a standard. Customer who prefer a hardware interface can purchase the fixture manual operation panel separately. If the hardware is installed, the software screen is disabled.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Both methods allow the control of the fixture manually. However, the Software Maintenance screen will provide more functionality as well as operation advice to the operator.
